short_summary: PW-22-01005247 - Floating Wharves Construction and Installation
description: This is the recall from Notice ID 30003300: Tender Notice and Request for Tenders - Construction and Installation of Floating Wharves, Pleasant Bay, Nova Scotia, Canada. A two-phase selection process is used for this project. Phase 1 involves the evaluation of all bidder qualifications; Phase 2 involves inviting the qualified bidders to provide a financial bid based on the specifications and drawings. Upon award of contract in Phase 2 the pre-qualification list will be terminated, and no-additional contracts will be awarded. The work covered under this contractconsists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material for the Floating Wharves Construction and Installation project at Pleasant Bay, Inverness County, Nova Scotia. The contract will be awarded through an open tendering process.
